Class DataArc

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.elements.data.DataElement
      • de.lambeck.pned.elements.data.DataArc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataArc, IDataElement, IArc, IElement

    public class DataArc
extends DataElement
implements IDataArc
    Implements the arcs (arrows) of the Petri net.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      • DataArc

        public DataArc(java.lang.String id,
               IDataNode source,
               IDataNode target)
        throws PNElementException
        Constructor with parameters for target and source. Makes sure that the arc always connects a place and a transition.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this Arc
        source - The source id
        target - The target id
        Throws:
        PNElementException - For an invalid combination of source and target

    • Method Detail

      • isValidConnection

        private boolean isValidConnection(IDataNode source,
                                  IDataNode target)
        Checks if source and target are a valid combination of a place and a transition.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        target - The target node
        Returns:
        true = valid combination, false = invalid combination

      • getAllPredCount

        public int getAllPredCount()
        Description copied from interface: IDataElement
        This method returns the number of predecessors. A node is a root element, if its number of predecessors is 0.
        Specified by:
        getAllPredCount in interface IDataElement
        Returns:
        Number of predecessors

      • getAllSuccCount

        public int getAllSuccCount()
        Description copied from interface: IDataElement
        This method returns the number of successors. A node is an end element, if its number of successors is 0.
        Specified by:
        getAllSuccCount in interface IDataElement
        Returns:
        Number of successors

      • getPredElem

        public IDataNode getPredElem()
                      throws PNElementException
        Description copied from interface: IDataArc
        This method returns the predecessor of the arc. If the arc has no predecessor (no "start"), the method returns null.
        Specified by:
